overview: SPYTEAM, they are here and nobody is safe! SPYTEAM, they are equipped with the latest espionage and surveillance technology! SPYTEAM, they have dedicated their lives to revealing adulterers, prostitutes and sodomites!  SPYTEAM, this movie brings before your eyes five of the most shocking cases of profanity from the grim archives of Spyteam. See how a girlfriend cheats on her boyfriend with a pornstar. See what a young country girl makes for a living in a big city. Feel the heat of a reverend and a grandma. Check out the hot neighbour girls taking a shover. And take a wild guess will the boss fuck his secretary up the ass at the office? Also featuring four hot Finnish XXX-scenes!
title: Spy Team - vakoilijat
